description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome back into the battle of Proetynia! This new episode of Lethal Judgment will let you fight against aliens all along the original levels of previous games. Play 5 furious stages with HD graphics and win 15 challenges to unlock all the included awards.
description.short: Welcome back into the battle of Proetynia! This new episode of Lethal Judgment will let you fight against aliens all along the original levels of previous games. Play 5 furious stages with HD graphics and win 15 challenges to unlock all the included awards.
